help: Forces one period of Arc Smelter processing.
Forces a synchronization pass for all War Syndicate industries.
Prints a list of all hull variants belonging to the specified manufacturer which use an inappropriate amount of OP. Manufacturer argument is case sensitive and includes whitespace.
Prints a list of all manufacturers of starships, weapons and hullmods in the sector.
Prints a list of all blueprints in the chosen category known by the faction.
Checks if a given faction knows a specific blueprint.
